reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects sensitive personal information that includes social security information, drivers' licenses, state ID cards, passport numbers, account login information, credit card numbers, financial account information, racial or ethnic origin, religious or philosophical beliefs, the contents of email and text, genetic data, biometric data, health data, and data concerning sexual orientation and sex life.

content: The contents of email and text
Data concerning sexual orientation and sex life

reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies the types of sensitive personal information that the app collects, indicating a comprehensive range of data categories.
reply.reference: If the business collects any of the following: - Social security information, drivers' licenses, state ID cards, passport numbers - Account login information - Credit card numbers, financial account information, or credentials allowing access to such accounts - Racial or ethnic origin, religious or philosophical beliefs, union membership - The contents of email and text, unless the business is the intended recipient of the communication - Genetic data, biometric data, and health data - Data concerning sexual orientation and sex life. URL: https://www.getpathway.io/privacy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that they use personal information for internal research and technological development, as well as disclose the information for specified purposes. It also mentions that they do not sell or share personal information to third parties.
reply.reference: We may use your personal information for our own business purposes, such as for undertaking internal research for technological development and demonstration. This is not considered to be 'selling' of your personal information. We have not disclosed, sold, or shared any personal information to third parties for a business or commercial purpose in the preceding twelve (12) months. We will not sell or share personal information in the future belonging to website visitors, users, and other consumers. URL: https://www.getpathway.io/privacy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the user can request to opt out from data collection or have their data deleted.
reply.reference: You may request to opt out from future selling or sharing of your personal information to third parties. Upon receiving an opt-out request, we will act upon the request as soon as feasibly possible, but no later than fifteen (15) days from the date of the request submission. URL: https://www.getpathway.io/privacy.html

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No, the app does not share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not disclose, sell, or share any personal information to third parties for a business or commercial purpose.
reply.reference: We have not disclosed, sold, or shared any personal information to third parties for a business or commercial purpose in the preceding twelve (12) months. We will not sell or share personal information in the future belonging to website visitors, users, and other consumers. URL: https://www.getpathway.io/privacy.html
